vehiclePlacable

boolean vehiclePlacable()
Return whether a vehicle can be placed on this lane Vehicles cannot be placed on some lanes, e.g. on those that are in junctions. Return here if it is possible to place a vehicle on this lane.

Returns:
Whether a vehicle is placable
